articles.description: Before Shericka Jackson, there was Florence Griffith Joyner, still the fastest woman on earth. A bank teller, a fashionista, a supreme athlete, the fastest there ever was. She died young at 38, in her sleep after an epileptic seizure but left an incredible in…
articles.content: The fastest living woman! The commentator would boom just as Jamaicas Shericka Jackson blurred along the track, arms pumping, knees kicking, to an incredible time of 21:45 to take gold at the World A… [+8549 chars]

articles.author: Charean Williams
articles.title: Jets place five players on PUP, including Mekhi Becton - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Jets placed offensive tackle Mekhi Becton, offensive tackle George Fant, defensive end Carl Lawson, tight end C.J. Uzomah and offensive guard Dru Samia on the active/physically unable to perform list, the team announced Thursday. The club also made the si…

articles.author: Scooby Axson
articles.title: Charles Barkley won't have 'selective outrage' as he looks into role at Saudi-backed LIV Golf - USA TODAY
articles.description: Charles Barkley said he would like to continue at "Inside the NBA" even if he takes a broadcast role at LIV Golf, but he expects "some blowback."
articles.content:
Charles Barkley says he wants to continue with his current job as an analyst for "Inside the NBA" while also pursuing other opportunities, such as commentating for LIV Golf. 
Barkley told the New Yo… [+1932 chars]
